b.recruitmenttype_id, b.recruitmentnumber_id, b.position_id, b.techstack_id, b.contactmethod_id, b.worktype_id, b.duration_id, b.user_id,
u.nickname AS nickname, r.recruitmenttype_name AS recruitmenttype_name, rn.recruitmentnumber AS recruitmentnumber, p.position_name AS position_name, t.techstack_name AS techstack_name, c.contactmethod_name AS contactmethod_name, w.worktype_name AS worktype_name, d.duration_name AS duration_name
FROM tbl_board b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN recruitment_type r ON b.recruitmenttype_id = r.recruitmenttype_id LEFT JOIN recruitmentnumber rn ON b.recruitmentnumber_id = rn.recruitmentnumber_id LEFT JOIN position p ON b.position_id = p.position_id LEFT JOIN techstack t ON b.techstack_id = t.techstack_id LEFT JOIN contactmethod c ON b.contactmethod_id = c.contactmethod_id LEFT JOIN worktype w ON b.worktype_id = w.worktype_id LEFT JOIN duration d ON b.duration_id = d.duration_id WHERE b.bno > 0 ORDER BY b.bno

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* 내부 서브쿼리에서 정렬된 결과에 ROWNUM 할당 */ sub.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( /* 원하는 정렬을 적용한 서브쿼리 */ SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.views, b.deadline, b.recruitmenttype_id, b.recruitmentnumber_id, b.position_id, b.techstack_id, b.contactmethod_id, b.worktype_id, b.duration_id, b.user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, r.recruitmenttype_name AS recruitmenttype_name, rn.recruitmentnumber AS recruitmentnumber, p.position_name AS position_name, t.techstack_name AS techstack_name, c.contactmethod_name AS contactmethod_name, w.worktype_name AS worktype_name, d.duration_name AS duration_name FROM tbl_board b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN recruitment_type r ON b.recruitmenttype_id = r.recruitmenttype_id LEFT JOIN recruitmentnumber rn ON b.recruitmentnumber_id = rn.recruitmentnumber_id LEFT JOIN position p ON b.position_id = p.position_id LEFT JOIN techstack t ON b.techstack_id = t.techstack_id LEFT JOIN contactmethod c ON b.contactmethod_id = c.contactmethod_id LEFT JOIN worktype w ON b.worktype_id = w.worktype_id LEFT JOIN duration d ON b.duration_id = d.duration_id WHERE b.bno > 0 ORDER BY b.bno DESC ) sub ) WHERE rn BETWEEN ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1) AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})
